It was won by conference regular season champion [[2009â10 Oakland Golden Grizzlies men's basketball team|Oakland University]]. Oakland defeated #2 seed [[2009â10 IUPUI Jaguars men's basketball team|IUPUI]] in the finals 76â64 behind Derick Nelson's career high 38 points. Nelson was named tournament MVP and was joined by teammates [[Keith Benson]] and Johnathon Jones on the All-Tournament Team.
